Brute.name: Brute
Brute.description: A tanky melee fighter who excels at absorbing damage and dealing heavy blows to adjacent enemies.

Tinkerer.name: Tinkerer
Tinkerer.description: A support specialist who heals allies and summons mechanical contraptions to aid the party.

Spellweaver.name: Spellweaver
Spellweaver.description: A powerful mage who controls elemental forces to devastate enemies from range.

Scoundrel.name: Scoundrel
Scoundrel.description: An agile rogue who strikes from advantage and uses cunning to outmaneuver foes.

Cragheart.name: Cragheart
Cragheart.description: A versatile earth elemental who can manipulate terrain and deals area damage.

Mindthief.name: Mindthief
Mindthief.description: A psionic assassin who augments melee attacks with mind control and illusions.
